C

CfCell - Class in connectfour
This class holds the properties of a connect four circle.
CfCell() - Constructor for class connectfour.CfCell
Constructor that instantiates a new cell and sets up the cell with default properties.
checkStatus(int, int, Player) - Method in class connectfour.ConnectFourGame
Helper method that checks the game board every time a new cell is added.
checkTie() - Method in class connectfour.ConnectFourGame
Helper method that checks to see if the top row of the game board has been filled completely and that there are no more available moves to make.
connectfour - package connectfour
 
ConnectFour - Class in connectfour
This class creates a JFrame to add the ConnectFourGUI to it and provides different options as well like exiting the game, and the option of creating a new game with a player or AI.
ConnectFour() - Constructor for class connectfour.ConnectFour
 
ConnectFourGame - Class in connectfour
This class is the controller of the MVC design, it creates a fully functional connect four game board and makes all decisions regarding the state of the game.
ConnectFourGame() - Constructor for class connectfour.ConnectFourGame
Constructor that instantiates a new game by setting all of the default values and by setting the first player's turn to blue.
ConnectFourGUI - Class in connectfour
This class is the view of the MVC design, it creates and handles all of the GUI components of a connect four game.
ConnectFourGUI() - Constructor for class connectfour.ConnectFourGUI
Constructor that instantiates a new game ConnectFourGame, and sets up the JButtons based off of the default board size found in the ConnectFourGame class.
